src:
حمله با چاقو در ایستگاه پلیس پاریس
02 Nov 2019 by عصر ايران



پلیس فرانسه مردی را در پی حمله با چاقو به یک زن جوان بازداشت کرد.
به گزارش ایلنا به نقل از خبرگزاری اسپوتنیک، پلیس فرانسه امروز -‌شنبه- مردی جوان را منطقه سنت دنیس پاریس به اتهام «خشونت عامدانه و هواداری از تروریسم» بازداشت کرده است. این خبر را رسانه‌های فرانسوی گزارش کردند.
رسانه‌ها گزارش داده‌اند که این مرد جوان تلاش داشته با چاقو به زنی جوان در یک ایستگاه پلیس حمله کند.
خبرگزاری فرانسه گزارش کرده است که این مرد جوان که حدودا ۲۰ سال سن دارد در لابی ایستگاه پلیس به یک زن جوان حمله کرده و چاقو را زیر گلوی او گذاشته است و شعارهایی در حمایت از گروه‌های افراط‌گرا فریاد زده است. پلیس اعلام کرده که این فرد بازداشت شده و به زن جوان نیز آسیبی نرسیده است.
تحقیقات در این زمینه در حال انجام است.
text:
Megumi Kaminishi Real Cutie Honey In the NMB era, the group “The Strongest Beauty Body”

02 Nov 2019

Former NMB48 actress Megumi Kaminishi (24) plays the first stage in the popular anime “Cutie Honey Emotional” (February 6-9, Tokyo, Sunshine Theater) I understand. In the NMB era, Kaminishi had a reputation for having the strongest beauty body among the 48 groups. Expectation is also expected for bold performances that shake off the innocent school image of the idol era only for popular works in sexy transformation scenes.
Among the best idol groups in Japan, Kaminishi, who was acclaimed as the No. 1 beauty body, came to a big “winning role”.
“Cutie Honey” is a masterpiece of manga artist Go Nagai (74), and her sexy and cute girl-shaped android Kisaragi Honey's transformation and battle scene gained enormous popularity. Although it was made into a movie and drama, it was the first time to make a stage. The role of Kisaragi Honey has been played by top gravure, Eriko Sato (37) in the movie and Miki Hara (32) in the drama.
This time, Kaminishi, where the white feathers stood, has not lost. While at NMB48, Fuji TV's “* AKB Survey”, which decides the top 10 in the group by member's vote, ranks 1st for Breasts & Beauty Navel, 6th for Beautiful Ass, 9th for Beautiful Legs In. Currently, he is mainly actress business, but there are a lot of offers in gravure. The weekly Playboy, which will be released on the 2nd, is scheduled to appear in magazines in the spring.
Graduated from NMB48 in April 2005 and resumed performing arts activities in May this year. In less than half a year, she has already appeared on two stages. From November 27th to December 8th, he appeared on the stage “team”. He is steadily increasing his reputation as an actress. For this work, “It is too happy to be able to do cutie honey at the first starring. After all that costume, the place that combines cuteness and sexy is the highlight. Recently I have also been gravure, so sexy I'll do my best to lead! "
